subject: America's Cup
Sailboats and Sailing
Boats and Boating
lead_paragraph: The next Cup races will be contested under an independent governing body and in the most modern of sailing craft, 72-foot-long wing-sailed catamarans capable of reaching 30 knots.
snippet: The next Cup races will be contested under an independent governing body and in the most modern of sailing craft, 72-foot-long wing-sailed catamarans capable of reaching 30 knots.
